titre: Software Engineer III (Level 4) @ Software Mansion S.A.
description: We usually work for tech startups so we’ve had our share of ever-changing, dynamic projects. In this environment, the development stage is planned only a few weeks ahead and pivots are an integral part of the job. But we like it this way – releases are quick and clients are open to trying out new technologies. What is more, there is very little chance you’ll be dealing with legacy code. Working at Software Mansion means: flat structure, fast technical decisions, no unnecessary stress – we draw …

Ready to apply? First check if you have: 5 years of professional front-end experience, ideally in SaaS or product development, Strong command of TypeScript and modern React (hooks, context, performance), Proven ability to structure, scale, and document component-based codebases, Practical knowledge of SPA/PWA architecture and state management, Good understanding of REST APIs, data handling, and async flows, Experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Cypress) and CI pipelines, Fluent Englis…
